name: Imotekh the Stormlord
unitComp: Imotekh the Stormlord is a single model armed with the Staff of the Destoyer and a gauntlet of fire. Only one of this model may be included in your army.

profiles.name: Gauntlet of fire
profiles.abilities: This weapon automatically hits its target.

abilities.name: Phase Shifter
abilities.detail: Imotekh the Stormlord has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: My Will Be Done
abilities.detail: At the beginning of each of your turns, choose a friendly NECRON INFANTRY unit within 6" of Imotekh the Stormlord. You can add 1 to the Advance, charge and hit rolls of that  unit until the beginning og your next turn. A unit can only be affected by this ability once in each turn.

abilities.name: Lord of the Storm
abilities.detail: Once per battle in your Shooting phase, Imotekh can call the storm: when he does so pick an enemy unit withing 48" of Imotekh, other that a CHARACTER, and roll a D6. On a 1 nothing happens, but on a 2+ that unit suffers that many mortal wounds. Then roll a D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of that unit. On a roll of 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Bloodswarm Necroscarabs
abilities.detail: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for friendly units of SAUTEKH Flayed Ones that are withing 12" of Immotekh the Stormlord.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.detail: Imotekh the Stormlord regains D3 lost wounds at the beginning of your turn, rather than 1, from his Living Metal ability.

name: Orikan the Diviner
unitComp: Orikan the Diviner is a single model armed with the Staff of Tomorrow. Only one of this model may be included in your army.

profiles.name: Staff of Tomorrow
profiles.abilities: You can re-roll failed hit rolls for this weapon.

abilities.name: Master Chronomancer
abilities.detail: Friendly SAUTEKH INFANTRY units within 6" of Orikan the Diviner has a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: The Stars Are Right
abilities.detail: Roll a D6 at the start of each of your turns. If the result is less than the current battle round number, Orikan uses the Orikan Empowered profile for the rest of the game (though any damage he has sustained is carried over).

abilities.name: Technomancer
abilities.detail: Add 1 to all Reanimation Protocol rolls for models from friendly SAUTEKH units withing 3" of any friendly SAUTEKH CRYPTEKS.

name: Necron Warriors
unitComp: This unit contains 10 Necron Warriors. It may include up to 10 additional Necron Warriors (Power Rating +6). Each model is equipped with a gauss flayer.

name: Canoptek Scarabs
unitComp: This unit contains 3 Canoptek Scarab Swarms. It may include up to 3 additional Canoptek Scarabs (Power Rating +2) or up to 6 additional Canoptek Scarab Swarms (Power Rating +4). Each swarm is equipped with feeder mandibles.

profiles.name: Feeder mandibles
profiles.abilities: If the target's Toughness is higher than this attack's Strength, this weapon always wounds the target on a wound roll of 5+.

name: Tomb Blades
unitComp: This unit contains 3 Tomb Blades. It can include up to 3 additional Tomb Blades (Power Rating +5) or up to 6 additional Tomb Blades (Power Rating +10). Each model is equipped with two gauss blasters.

profiles.name: Tesla carbine
profiles.abilities: Each hit roll of 6+ with this weapon causes 3 hits instead of 1.

wargear: Any model may replace its two gauss blasters with two tesla carbines or a particle caster.
Any model may take a nebuloscope or a shadowloom.

abilities.name: Shadowloom
abilities.detail: A model with a shadowloom has a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Nebuloscope
abilities.detail: Enemies attacked by a model with a nebuloscope do not receive a bonus to their save from being in cover.

abilities.name: Shiledvanes
abilities.detail: A model with shieldvanes has a Save characteristic of 3+.

name: Monolith
unitComp: A Monolith is a single model equipped with four gauss flux arcs and a particle whip.

abilities.name: Floating Fortress
abilities.detail: This model can move and fire Heavy weapons without suffering the penalty to its hit rolls.

abilities.name: Death Descending
abilities.detail: During deployment, you can set up a Monolith in the upper atmosphere instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases the Monolith can plummet to the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 12" from any enemy models.

abilities.name: Eternity Gate
abilities.detail: When you set up this model, at the same time you can also set up any number of <DYNASTY> INFANTRY units on their tomb world rather than setting them up on the battlefield. Before the Monolith moves in each of your Movement phases, a single unit that was set up on their tomb world can be transported onto the battlefield by the Monolith. To do so, set up the unit so that it is wholly within 3" of the Monolith and more than 1" from the enemy. If all friendly Night Scythes and Monoliths are destroyed, any units still on the tomb world are considered to be slain.

abilities.name: Portal of Exile
abilities.detail: When an enemy unit (other than a MONSTER or VEHICLE) charges this model, its portal of exile may activiate. Roll a D6 and compare it to the value required on the damage table above. If the roll is successfull, the charging unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Explodes
abilities.detail: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing it from the battlefield. On a 6 it explodes, and each unit withing 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

name: Triarch Stalker
unitComp: A Triarch Stalker is a single model equiped with a heat ray and massive forelimbs.

weapons.name: Heat ray
weapons.multiProfileComment: When attacking with this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

profiles.name: - Dispersed
profiles.abilities: When you use this profile, this weapon automatically hits its target.

profiles.name: - Focused
profiles.abilities: When you use this profile, if the target is within half range, roll two dice when inflicting damage with it and discard the lowest result.

wargear: This model may replace its heat ray with a particle shredder or a twin gauss cannon.

abilities.name: Targeting Relay
abilities.detail: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for any friendly NECRON unit that makes a shooting attack against a unit that has already been attacked by any Triarch Stalker in this phase.

abilities.name: Quantum Shielding
abilities.detail: Each time this model suffers damage from an unsaved wound. roll a D6. If the result is less than the damage inflicted by the attack, the damage is ignored. (eg. if this model suffers 4 damage, if you then roll a 3 or less the damage is ignored).

name: Broodlord
unitComp: A Broodlord is a single model armed with monstrous rending claws.

profiles.name: Monstrous rending claws
profiles.abilities: You can re-roll failed wound rolls when attacking with this weapon. In addition, each time you make a wound roll of 6+, that hit is resolved with an AP of -6 and Damage of 3.

abilities.name: Lightning Reflexes
abilities.detail: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Swift and Deadly
abilities.detail: This model can charge even if it Advanced during its turn.

abilities.name: Brood Telepathy
abilities.detail: You can add 1 to hit rolls in the Fight phase for <HIVE FLEET> Genestealer units within 6" of any friendly <HIVE FLEET> Broodlords.

psyker: A Broodlord can attempt to manifest one psychic power in each friendly Psychic phase, and attempt to deny one psychic power in each enemy Psychic phase. It knows the Smite psychic power and one psychic power from the Hive Mind discipline (pg 85).

name: Genestealers
unitComp: This unit contains 5 Genestealers. It can include up to 5 additional Genestealers (Power Rating +4), up to 10 additional Genestealers (Power Rating +8), or up to 15 additional Genestealers (Power Rating +12). Each model is armed with rending claws.

profiles.name: Rending claws
profiles.abilities: Each time you make a wound roll of 6+ for this weapon, that hit is resolved with an AP of -4.

profiles.name: Scything talons
profiles.abilities: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 when attacking with this weapon.

wargear: Any model may also have a pair of scything talons.
All models in the unit may have toxin sacs.

abilities.name: Flurry of Claws
abilities.detail: Genestealers have 4 Attacks instead of 3 while their unit has 10 or more models.

abilities.name: Lightning Reflexes
abilities.detail: Genestealers have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Swift and Deadly
abilities.detail: Genestealers can charge even if they Advanced during their turn.
